name: I died, and I was transported into a Stick Figure Runner Game
name_original: I died, and I was transported into a Stick Figure Runner Game
description:
A little runner game with a stick man as the main character.

Leo was a salary man who unfortunately died by 5 lightning strikes in a thunderstorm. Luckily, he was transported to another world, where he is now endlessly running, while fighting weird flying enemies.
